snippet: Luiz Felipe Scolari stepped down as coach of the national team after a disappointing World Cup.
abstract: Luiz Felipe Scolari resigns as Brazil’s national soccer coach after team’s failure to win 2014 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Luiz Felipe Scolari stepped down as coach of the national team after a disappointing World Cup.

headline.main: Scolari Resigns as Coach of Brazil
headline.print_headline: Scolari Resigns as Coach of Brazil
